U.S. Moves to "Spread Democracy" Assailed
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Mongolia 
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society for commemorating the Day of the Sun was formed with due ceremony at the Mongolian Palace of Culture on Mar. 10.
 The executive chairman of the Friendship Society said at the ceremony that the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the world revolution would be immortal, adding that its members would significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun through such positive activities as introducing his greatness among the Mongolian people.
 The ceremony elected Ch. Surenjav, chairman of the Mongolian society, chairman of the preparatory committee and the executive chairman of the society its general secretary.    
 The preparatory committee set a commemoration period from Mar. 10 to Apr. 15 and decided to organize colorful functions including meeting, photo exhibition and film show in the period.

Minister of Railways Leaves for Russia 
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Minister of Railways of the DPRK Kim Yong Sam left here Thursday to visit Russia. 
 He was seen off at the airport by Jon Kil Su, executive vice-minister of Railways, and Alexander Matsegora, Russian charge d'affaires ad interim in Pyongyang.

articles.title: FM of DPRK Meets Singaporean Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets British Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK Paek Nam Sun met and had a talk with John Everard, British ambassador e.p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.content:
Photo Session with Participants in KPA Meeting Held
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The participants in the meeting of activists in the movement for winning the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment of the Korean People's Army had a photo session at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche, on Mar. 16.
 Present there were KPA Vice Marshal Jo Myong Rok, director of the General Political Department of the KPA, Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Vice Marshal Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and officials of the ministry.
